title: Womens Dress
title_original: Beopjesk Women's V-Neck Christmas Knitted Sweaters Winter Vintage Merry and Bright Snowflake Xmas Holiday Pullover Tops

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #103,073 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,148 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater's design adorable and appreciate its perfect fit and comfort, with one mentioning it's not scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute holiday sweater
items.body: Cute holiday sweater. Nice quality and fit. Kept me warm and comfy. Read more
items.author: AR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and doesn’t itch!
items.body: I really do love this sweater. Here’s a couple reasons why. I like the V-neck so it doesn’t feel like I’m being strangled. Plus you can wear a necklace with this and it looks adorable. You could also - if you wanted to - coffee wear a long sleeve button-down shirt underneath and pull the collar over the V-neck and that would look adorable as well. It washes great. Honestly, I just let it hang dry. But I did wash on cold and delicate cycle. Inside out. I’ve gotten a bazillion compliments on it, and I have worn it with everything from jeans to a skirt to black pants. Highly recommend. Oh, and it’s not scratchy! I’m in the south so sometimes I put a tank top underneath it and it’s perfect. I am 5’6” and weigh 134 pounds - I have DD’s and ordered a small. Read more
items.author: Colorado Gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Loved this sweater. It fit perfectly! I believe I ordered a small and at 5 9’ and 136lbs it fit perfectly and it was comfortable. I got so many compliments on this sweater! The black and white design was exactly as shown. So happy with this purchase Read more
items.author: l.behrman

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Itchy
items.body: Cute, Fit Well. Rises up on the back of the neck about 2 inches so I have to keep pulling it down. Other than that it is great. It is medium weight. Not itchy. Average quality. Read more
items.author: Amanda Richie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs small and not worth the price
items.body: The stitching on the one I got is a big mess under the eye.. Read more
items.author: Fish

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute winter sweater
items.body: Very cute winter sweater. I ordered a small and it fits perfect. True to size. Read more
items.author: Julie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap fabric & runs LARGE. Sent back.
items.body: This is a low quality sweater that runs large. The v-neck is stretched out weird. There’s no way this should cost $45. It looks so cheap compared to the advertised photo. It probably cost $2 to manufacture. Sent it back. Read more
items.author: o-LORA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, festive, and easy to style
items.body: The sweater is not quite as soft as I was hoping, but it’s also not itchy, which was important to me. It’s very cute and has a fun, festive look that works well for the holiday season. I love that it can be styled in different ways - dressed up or down with jeans, skirts, or boots. The price is fair, fits true to size and I’ve already worn it several times as we get closer to Christmas. I consistently get compliments whenever I wear it, which is always a plus. Overall, a great holiday sweater if you’re looking for something festive and versatile. Read more
items.author: Sabiha

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Heart, Red, St, White, White-black, Red-1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
